div.p: The Digital Archive will be created as Phase 3 of the PCDA. Selected manuscripts (music, letters, ephemera) will be linked to catalogue entries, and accessed directly via the Browse menu. Metadata will explain the contents and the relation of digitized materials to the work. An index will list all digitized materials. To view digitized sources outside those published on PCDA you will be asked to apply to the Foundation.
